Articles.Content:
its like the title says, SAS is not working.. at all. not even EVA. All clean install, no mods, no nothing, just ran the game.

I did not uncheck the "EVA autorotate to camera".

One day it was working, the next it was poo. Not sure if there was an update in between my sessions but im 100% sure i didnt change any settings. Halp Halp

"did you try pressing "T"?"

... i have 2k hours in KSP...

I remember watching a guy on Twitch playing KSP who had the same issue (fresh KSP install, SAS not working at all). Verifying the files via the respective Steam feature did resolve the issue. Might be worth a try, I think.

Edited September 26, 2020 by VoidSquid
